question: Elon Musk out as Senior Advisor to Trump in May?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Elon Musk ceases to be Senior Advisor to the President for any period of time between May 1, 12:00 AM ET, and May 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

An announcement of Musk’s resignation or removal from this role before this market’s end date will immediately resolve this market to “Yes”, regardless of when the announced resignation or removal goes into effect.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the Trump administration; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Elon Musk out as Senior Advisor to Trump in May?
events.description:

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the Trump administration; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Earthquake 7.0 or above in May?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if 1 or more earthquakes with a magnitude of 7.0 or higher occur anywhere on earth between May 1, and May 31, 2025 ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market is the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Earthquake hazards program (https://earthquake.usgs.gov/earthquakes/browse/significant.php#sigdef).

If an earthquake of substantial size has occurred within this market's timeframe but not yet appeared on the resolution source, this market may remain open until June 7, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, or until the earthquake in question otherwise appears on the resolution source. If such an earthquake has not appeared on the resolution source by that date, another credible resolution source will be used.

If such an earthquake has not appeared on the resolution source by that date, another credible resolution source will be used.

question: Will Edi Rama be the next Prime Minister of Albania after the 2025 election?
description:
The 2025 Albanian parliamentary election will be held on May 11, 2025, to elect members of the Kuvendi (Albania's unicameral parliament).

This market will resolve according to the next Prime Minister of Albania following the election.

Any interim/caretaker Prime Minister will not count toward the resolution of this market. If no next Prime Minister of Albania is instated by February 28, 2026, 11:59 PM ET this market will resolve to "Other."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the Government of Albania, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Tesla name a new CEO before July?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tesla officially announces a successor to Elon Musk as CEO of Tesla by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

An announcement of a successor will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of if/when the announced replacement actually becomes the next CEO of Tesla.

The resolution source will be public statements from Tesla.

The resolution source will be public statements from Tesla.

question: Rockets vs. Warriors
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for May 2 at 9:00 PM ET:
If the Houston Rockets win, the market will resolve to “Rockets”.
If the Golden State Warriors win, the market will resolve to “Warriors”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Paris Saint Germain win on 2025-05-07?
description:
In the upcoming UCL game, scheduled for May 7 at 3:00PM ET,
If Paris Saint Germain wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
If Paris Saint Germain loses, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.

This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Will global temperature increase by less than 1.05ºC in May 2025?
description:
This market will resolve to the value reported by the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for May 2025 when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An anomaly of a named bracket for May 2025 is necessary and sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" immediately once the data becomes available regardless of whether the figure for May 2025 is later revised.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figure found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "May" in the row "2025" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for May 2025 is provided by NASA by September 1, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "Yes".

events.title: May 2025 Temperature Increase (ºC)
events.description:
This market will resolve to the value reported by the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for May 2025 when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An anomaly of a named bracket for May 2025 is necessary and sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" immediately once the data becomes available regardless of whether the figure for May 2025 is later revised.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figure found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "May" in the row "2025" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for May 2025 is provided by NASA by September 1, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "Yes".

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on May 3?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 02 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 03 May 12:00 ET candle.
This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 02 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 03 May 12:00 ET candle.
If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will the Alliance for a Great Albania win the most seats in the next Albanian election?
description:
The 2025 Albanian parliamentary election is scheduled to be held on May 11, 2025, to elect members of the Kuvendi (Albania's unicameral parliament).

This market will resolve according to the party that controls the most seats in the Albanian Parliament as a result of the next Albanian parliamentary election.

If voting in the next Albanian parliamentary election does not occur by December 31, 2025, this market will resolve to "Other".

In the case of a tie between this party and any other for the most seats held, this market will resolve in favor of the party whose listed abbreviation comes first in alphabetical order.

This market's resolution will be based solely on the number of seats won by this party, not any coalition of which it may be a part.

This market will resolve based on the result of the election as indicated by a consensus of credible reporting. If there is ambiguity, this market will resolve based solely on the official results as reported by the Albanian government, specifically the Central Election Commission of Albania (Komisioni Qendror i Zgjedhjeve – KQZ) (https://kqz.gov.al/).

Note: Constituent parties of the Alliance for a Great Albania coalition will be considered a single party, NOT a coalition for the purpose of this market. If this alliance breaks up prior to the election, the market for Alliance for a Great Albania will be assigned to the Democratic Party of Albania.

Constituent parties of the Albania Becomes Initiative coalition will be considered a single party, NOT a coalition for the purpose of this market. If this alliance breaks up prior to the election, the market for Albania Becomes Initiative will be assigned to Nisma Thurje.

question: Will Donald Trump be the next Pope?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump is announced as the next bishop of Rome after Pope Francis. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If no new pope is announced by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from the Vatican, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will John Mulaney actually fight children?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if John Mulaney fights one or more individuals below the age of 18 by May 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

Choreographed stunts, competitive games (e.g., dodgeball, trivia, or card games), slapstick humor, stunts or comedic sketches will not qualify. 

Performances which are possibly staged but include elements of real physical fighting such as punching or wrestling will qualify, as long as they are not obviously slapstick/stunts. 

The primary resolution source will be video evidence, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
